document_data.name: Inquest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Inquest''' was the a group of brilliant inventors that acted as the governing body of the [[Abeir]]an city of [[Xorvintroth]].{{Cite adventurers league/Expedition to the Supreme Forge|2}}
document_data.Possessions: Notable among the group's inventions were ''[[far realm battery|far realm batteries]]'',{{Cite adventurers league/Expedition to the Supreme Forge|6}} a 'teleportation ray', used to quickly convey individuals across their city,{{Cite adventurers league/Expedition to the Supreme Forge|7}} the autonomous [[metallic peacekeeper]]s,{{Cite adventurers league/Expedition to the Supreme Forge|18}} and perhaps their greatest creation, the [[dragonbone golem]].{{Cite adventurers league/Expedition to the Supreme Forge|19}}

Members.Notable Members: At the time of the Inquest's ruination, its four elders included [[Ukthet]], [[Lirith]], [[Krektesh]], and [[Graoul]].

document_data.Relationships: They maintained a working relationship with the [[Key Project]] team, via that group's liaison [[Ra'Bindranax]].{{Cite adventurers league/Frozen Whispers|32}}
